		<title>Asia shares slip, yen hovers near two-week low on BOJ stimulus expectations</title>


		<description>TOKYO/SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Asian shares fell on Friday after a rocky performance on Wall Street, while the yen hovered near two-week lows as traders wagered the Bank of Japan will add to its massive stimulus before too long.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=aigC1LpPHrM:oLnB5Mxuxuc:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=aigC1LpPHrM:oLnB5Mxuxuc:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=aigC1LpPHrM:oLnB5Mxuxuc:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=aigC1LpPHrM:oLnB5Mxuxuc:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=aigC1LpPHrM:oLnB5Mxuxuc:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/aigC1LpPHrM" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/aigC1LpPHrM/us-global-markets-idUSKCN0Y402N</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-global-markets-idUSKCN0Y402N?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 02:19:07 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-global-markets-idUSKCN0Y402N?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Apple invests $1 billion in Chinese ride-hailing service Didi Chuxing</title>


		<description>(Reuters) - Apple Inc  said on Thursday it has invested $1 billion in Chinese ride-hailing service Didi Chuxing, a move that Apple Chief Executive Tim Cook said would help the company better understand the critical Chinese market.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=7Hs2a7E_B98:wDT0Om4YJzk:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=7Hs2a7E_B98:wDT0Om4YJzk:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=7Hs2a7E_B98:wDT0Om4YJzk:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=7Hs2a7E_B98:wDT0Om4YJzk:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=7Hs2a7E_B98:wDT0Om4YJzk:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/7Hs2a7E_B98" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/7Hs2a7E_B98/us-apple-china-idUSKCN0Y404W</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-apple-china-idUSKCN0Y404W?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 00:42:29 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-apple-china-idUSKCN0Y404W?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Oil prices fall on stronger dollar; Russia warns of longer glut</title>


		<description>SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Oil prices fell by around one percent on Friday as a stronger dollar weighed and Russia warned that a global crude supply overhang could last into next year.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=8PElfcpMrBs:h6rSt3hjF9I:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=8PElfcpMrBs:h6rSt3hjF9I:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=8PElfcpMrBs:h6rSt3hjF9I:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=8PElfcpMrBs:h6rSt3hjF9I:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=8PElfcpMrBs:h6rSt3hjF9I:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/8PElfcpMrBs" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/8PElfcpMrBs/us-global-oil-idUSKCN0Y4024</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-global-oil-idUSKCN0Y4024?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:22:00 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-global-oil-idUSKCN0Y4024?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>BOJ will act decisively using its 'ample' tools: Kuroda</title>


		<description>TOKYO (Reuters) - Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said on Friday the central bank will act "decisively" to achieve its 2 percent inflation target, stressing that it still has "ample" policy options available if it were to expand stimulus again.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=LkOr9Izwv70:SpFThja5v54:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=LkOr9Izwv70:SpFThja5v54:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=LkOr9Izwv70:SpFThja5v54:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=LkOr9Izwv70:SpFThja5v54:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=LkOr9Izwv70:SpFThja5v54:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/LkOr9Izwv70" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/LkOr9Izwv70/us-japan-economy-boj-idUSKCN0Y40AB</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-japan-economy-boj-idUSKCN0Y40AB?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 01:12:15 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-japan-economy-boj-idUSKCN0Y40AB?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Nissan faces challenges with Mitsubishi but won't impose management: Ghosn</title>


		<description>YOKOHAMA, Japan (Reuters) - Nissan Motor Co  CEO Carlos Ghosn said restoring Mitsubishi Motors'  credibility with consumers will be his top challenge but that Japan's second-biggest automaker will not impose its management on the smaller, scandal-hit car maker.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=QsctDIZ4m14:ECDzsJzHUZw:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=QsctDIZ4m14:ECDzsJzHUZw:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=QsctDIZ4m14:ECDzsJzHUZw:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=QsctDIZ4m14:ECDzsJzHUZw:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=QsctDIZ4m14:ECDzsJzHUZw:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/QsctDIZ4m14" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/QsctDIZ4m14/us-nissan-mitsubishimotors-idUSKCN0Y40JE</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-nissan-mitsubishimotors-idUSKCN0Y40JE?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:20:55 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-nissan-mitsubishimotors-idUSKCN0Y40JE?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>For Deutsche Bank's Cryan, profit can wait</title>


		<description>FRANKFURT (Reuters) - Almost one year into his tenure as Deutsche Bank's chief executive, John Cryan says he has ushered in a new culture of openness, rooted out bad behavior and set about untangling the bank's technology.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=QIz0n9yUi_M:qjyr9TJZowk:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=QIz0n9yUi_M:qjyr9TJZowk:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=QIz0n9yUi_M:qjyr9TJZowk:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=QIz0n9yUi_M:qjyr9TJZowk:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=QIz0n9yUi_M:qjyr9TJZowk:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/QIz0n9yUi_M" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/QIz0n9yUi_M/us-deutschebank-cryan-insight-idUSKCN0Y40GK</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-deutschebank-cryan-insight-idUSKCN0Y40GK?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 02:08:35 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-deutschebank-cryan-insight-idUSKCN0Y40GK?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>U.S. jobless claims hit 14-month high; analysts blame Verizon strike </title>


		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The number of Americans filing for unemployment benefits rose last week to a more than one-year high, but economists blamed striking telecommunications workers for the surge and said the data did not signal a deterioration in the overall labor market.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=OKBGhsb03lg:7OouJP21wAk:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=OKBGhsb03lg:7OouJP21wAk:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=OKBGhsb03lg:7OouJP21wAk:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=OKBGhsb03lg:7OouJP21wAk:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=OKBGhsb03lg:7OouJP21wAk:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/OKBGhsb03lg" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/OKBGhsb03lg/us-usa-economy-idUSKCN0Y31LN</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-economy-idUSKCN0Y31LN?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 12:32:32 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-economy-idUSKCN0Y31LN?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Hedge fund managers give stock picks in Vegas at SALT conference</title>


		<description>LAS VEGAS (Reuters) - Hedge fund managers on Thursday named some of their recent investments, including a bet that shares of American Airlines Group  would fall and shares of both Chinese Internet company Tencent  and chipmaker Xilinx  would rise, in addresses at one of the industry's most prominent conferences.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=rQIxAjtQdP4:_HfXftrz7tU:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=rQIxAjtQdP4:_HfXftrz7tU:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=rQIxAjtQdP4:_HfXftrz7tU:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=rQIxAjtQdP4:_HfXftrz7tU:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=rQIxAjtQdP4:_HfXftrz7tU:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/rQIxAjtQdP4" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/rQIxAjtQdP4/us-hedgefunds-sachemhead-zoetis-idUSKCN0Y32MW</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-hedgefunds-sachemhead-zoetis-idUSKCN0Y32MW?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
        <category>businessNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 18:03:26 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-hedgefunds-sachemhead-zoetis-idUSKCN0Y32MW?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>In search for growth, Goldman turns to debt</title>


		<description>(Reuters) - Goldman Sachs Group Inc  is hosting its first ever leveraged finance conference next week as the Wall Street bank tries to strengthen its position in debt underwriting and looks for new avenues of growth.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=WYT0Cic2fQY:RfCEEQCV2kQ:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=WYT0Cic2fQY:RfCEEQCV2kQ:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=WYT0Cic2fQY:RfCEEQCV2kQ:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=WYT0Cic2fQY:RfCEEQCV2kQ:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=WYT0Cic2fQY:RfCEEQCV2kQ:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/WYT0Cic2fQY" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/WYT0Cic2fQY/us-goldman-sachs-debt-idUSKCN0Y31Z0</link>

<item>
		<title>European car sales up 9 percent in April, VW brand back to growth</title>


		<description>MILAN (Reuters) - European car sales rose 9 percent in April, industry data showed on Friday, with nearly all auto manufacturers recording sales increases and Volkswagen's  namesake brand back to growth despite its diesel emissions scandal.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=C3vofKiIn3o:7E9apcBswuc:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=C3vofKiIn3o:7E9apcBswuc:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=C3vofKiIn3o:7E9apcBswuc:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?a=C3vofKiIn3o:7E9apcBswuc:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/businessNews?i=C3vofKiIn3o:7E9apcBswuc:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~4/C3vofKiIn3o" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/businessNews/~3/C3vofKiIn3o/us-europe-carsales-idUSKCN0Y40G4</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-europe-carsales-idUSKCN0Y40G4?feedType=RSS&feedName=businessNews</guid>
